[color=#a4885c]Power System:[/color] 2x SUPERPACMAN Uranium Generator
[color=#a4885c]Atmospherics:[/color] Gas Mixer, Premixed Air Connector
[color=#a4885c]Weapons:[/color] 4x L85 Autocannons
[color=#a4885c]IFF Designation:[/color] Science
"Manufactured by the Ursadine Collective, the Insight is a top of the line xenoarchaeology vessel"
# SHIP FEATURES
## 1. Bridge
### 1.1. Control Systems
- Unlock the Shuttle computer using your ID card. - Use the Station Records computer to open up slots for the other crew members. - The Gunnery Console can be used to control the ship's turrets. - The Holopad can be used to directly contact other ships or stations.
### 1.2. Safety Systems
- Check that the pilot's EVA locker is filled with a hardsuit, air tank, and mini-jetpack. - The button on the table can be used to toggle the shutters. - The locking button toggles the ship lights
## 2. Science
### 2.1. Artifact Lab
- Artifacts can be found on wrecks in space - Use a Multitool to connect the Artifact Analyzer and the Analysis Console. - Check that the Research Director's locker is filled with a hardsuit, air tank, and mini-jetpack. - The Blast Door can be used to open the lab to space. It is opened with the button on the desk. - The Gas Pressure Pumps can be used to pump air into or out of the lab.
### 2.2 Research and Development
- The Research and Development console can be used to research new technologies. - The Research and Development Server can be used to store research data. - The Server is not limited to a single research focus, and can be linked to new machines.
### 2.3. Production
- The Protolathe can be used to produce researched items and components. - The Circuit Imprinter can be used to produce circuit boards for various machines. - The Autolathe can be used to produce a wide variety of basi items
## 3. Engineering
### 3.1. Power System
- Check that the S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generator units are anchored to the floor. - Set the power output on each generator to 20. - Check that the SMES unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the Fuel Locker has spare fuel.
### 3.2. Atmospherics
- Set the Ships Air Alarms to Filtering (Wide) - Ensure that a gas canisters are wrenched to the connector ports. - Check that the air mixer is set to ~21% oxygen, ~79% nitrogen (Confirm Crew Biology). - The white Gas Connector can be used to connect premixed air canisters to the ship's atmospherics system.
### 3.3 Other Systems
- Check that the gyroscope is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the mini gravity generator is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the Salvage Locker has tools, a hardsuit, air tank, and a mini-jetpack.
## 4. Service
### 4.1 Messhall
- The freezer and shelf can be used to store kitchen supplies - The sink provides fresh SinkStemlessWater
### 4.2 Dorm
- Beds and a bathroom are included
## 5. Medical
- The medical bed can heal minor injuries - The wall locker does NOT come with medical supplies
